Dark Slowly adds pressure to his foot on Liono chest "Lio your not a hero 
your just a ruthless criminal that tried to be king."

Lio chest starts to cave in a little more ever start to swirl and change. Lio 
is getting Flashbacks.

::The Past::
Lio Looks at key "I no Leader or space hero I can't believe they gave me this 
at job at the depo."

Key Laughing "You sure look like a hero to me. I got you something."

Liono Opens the gift It a black box with a silver Lion on it as he slowly 
opens it to reveal a Sword of divine making. "Thank you."

Key hugs Liono "this sword is special it can even cut a laser and can only 
react you name it. Your best is all anyone can ask for and as long as we 
never give up we are giving the world that. There something I have to tell 
you."

Lio hugs her back "I'll call it Keyura I have to go now tell me at the 
cybertron ball." Liono remember hellbeast attacked the ball and he never 
heard what she had to say.
::Present:: 
Liono eye flutter in as he tries to focus.

Dark applys a little more pressure.

Lio drifts out under the pain trying to focus on the  dark.

Dark looks at Lio this game is no fun if they don't scream as he extents his 
arm blade and Draws it back to take Lio head. 

As the blade swings forward A white Lion grabs the arm halting its forward 
motion.

Lio comes back to reality and starts to focus that lion that's gave me my 
beast mode.

Dark Slings the beast off his arm and into the air and slash its rib cage 
with the other arm.

Dark looks Lio "What ever happened to believing in yourself and your dreams? 
Your a reckless fool. And now your a dead one."
